boot.isExisting: select count(BootId) from boot where BootUID=?
boot.update: update boot set LastTime=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where BootUID=?
boot.update2: update boot set DownTime=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where BootUID=?
boot.update3: update boot set DownTime=LastTime where DownTime is null
boot.select: select BootId,UpTime,LastTime,DownTime from boot where BootUID=?

file.isExisting: select count(FPUID) from file where FPUID=?
file.update: update file set Count=Count+1,CreateCount=CreateCount+?, DeleteCount=DeleteCount+?,ReadCount=ReadCount+?,ReadSize=ReadSize+?,WriteCount=WriteCount+?,WriteSize=WriteSize+?,LastTime=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where FPUID=?

process.list: select ProcName,ProcPath,count(*) cnt,sum(KernelTime+UserTime) time, sum(KernelTime) ktime, sum(UserTime) utime from process where BootUID=? group by ProcPath order by time desc
